name: GearUp!
description:
Original action puzzle game! GearUp combines real-time action with strategic puzzle solving. Simple one-tap control. Intensive gameplay, Instant Addiction!

- One of a kind Action puzzle game! Merge and eliminate gears before they hit the top!
- Tap Gears with same color to merge and combine star pieces
- When a complete star is formed, it will blast away all gears of the same color!
- Level up as you play! Game will get more difficult, but you will get higher scores!

- We hope you enjoy this game!
